00026 #ifndef _LIBCFS_BYTEORDER_H
00027 #define _LIBCFS_BYTERODER_H
00028 
00029 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00030 # include <asm/byteorder.h>
00031 #else /* __KERNEL__ */
00032 
00033 # ifdef HAVE_ENDIAN_H
00034 #  include <endian.h>
00035 # endif
00036 # include <byteswap.h>
00037 
00038 # define __swab16(x) bswap_16(x)
00039 # define __swab32(x) bswap_32(x)
00040 # define __swab64(x) bswap_64(x)
00041 # define __swab16s(x)                           \
00042         do {                                    \
00043                 *(x) = bswap_16(*(x));          \
00044         } while (0)
00045 # define __swab32s(x)                           \
00046         do {                                    \
00047                 *(x) = bswap_32(*(x));          \
00048         } while (0)
00049 # define __swab64s(x)                           \
00050         do {                                    \
00051                 *(x) = bswap_64(*(x));          \
00052         } while (0)
00053 # if __BYTE_ORDER == __LITTLE_ENDIAN
00054 #  define le16_to_cpu(x) (x)
00055 #  define cpu_to_le16(x) (x)
00056 #  define le32_to_cpu(x) (x)
00057 #  define cpu_to_le32(x) (x)
00058 #  define le64_to_cpu(x) (x)
00059 #  define cpu_to_le64(x) (x)
00060 
00061 #  define be16_to_cpu(x) bswap_16(x)
00062 #  define cpu_to_be16(x) bswap_16(x)
00063 #  define be32_to_cpu(x) bswap_32(x)
00064 #  define cpu_to_be32(x) bswap_32(x)
00065 #  define be64_to_cpu(x) ((__u64)bswap_64(x))
00066 #  define cpu_to_be64(x) ((__u64)bswap_64(x))
00067 # elif __BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN
00068 #  define le16_to_cpu(x) bswap_16(x)
00069 #  define cpu_to_le16(x) bswap_16(x)
00070 #  define le32_to_cpu(x) bswap_32(x)
00071 #  define cpu_to_le32(x) bswap_32(x)
00072 #  define le64_to_cpu(x) ((__u64)bswap_64(x))
00073 #  define cpu_to_le64(x) ((__u64)bswap_64(x))
00074 
00075 #  define be16_to_cpu(x) (x)
00076 #  define cpu_to_be16(x) (x)
00077 #  define be32_to_cpu(x) (x)
00078 #  define cpu_to_be32(x) (x)
00079 #  define be64_to_cpu(x) (x)
00080 #  define cpu_to_be64(x) (x)
00081 # else /*  __BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN */
00082 #  error "Unknown byte order"
00083 # endif /* __BYTE_ORDER != __BIG_ENDIAN */
00084 
00085 #endif /* !__KERNEL__ */
00086 
00087 #endif /* _LIBCFS_BYTEORDER_H */
